suite_info.name: Base Model Hard Knowledge Test Suite
suite_info.description: Maximum complexity knowledge domain tests requiring expert-level traditional knowledge systems understanding, sophisticated epistemological reasoning, and master-level cultural integration

tests.name: Test 23: Master-Level Cross-Continental Traditional Medicine Integration
tests.description: Integrate master-level traditional medicine knowledge across five continental systems
tests.prompt:
Develop comprehensive understanding of chronic pain treatment across five major traditional medicine systems, addressing complex integration challenges:

AFRICAN TRADITIONAL MEDICINE: Ubuntu healing philosophy, communal treatment approaches, plant medicine combinations, spiritual healing integration, ancestor consultation protocols

TRADITIONAL CHINESE MEDICINE: Qi flow analysis, acupuncture point combinations, herbal formula interactions, seasonal treatment variations, constitutional assessment methods

AYURVEDA: Dosha imbalance correction, panchamahabhutha analysis, complex herbal preparations, yoga therapy integration, spiritual practice incorporation

NATIVE AMERICAN MEDICINE: Sacred plant ceremonies, sweat lodge healing, medicine wheel teachings, tribal-specific protocols, vision quest integration

AMAZON CURANDERISMO: Plant spirit communication, icaros (healing songs), ayahuasca ceremonial protocols, ecological healing relationships, shamanic diagnostics

Analyze complex integration addressing:
- Conflicting diagnostic frameworks and treatment philosophies
- Cultural appropriation vs. respectful knowledge exchange
- Spiritual/ceremonial elements vs. practical medical applications  
- Individual vs. community-based healing approaches
- Traditional knowledge protection and intellectual property
- Modern safety standards while preserving traditional efficacy
- Training and certification across multiple systems
- Clinical research methodology adaptation for traditional practices

Provide master-level traditional medicine integration analysis:
